document_title: Mastitis: Causes, signs, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_content:
Signs and symptoms of mastitis can appear suddenly, including [2]:
Thickening of breast tissue or lumps in the breast; Breasts are swollen; Touching the breast feels warm and hot; A red patch of skin, often wedge-shaped; Pain or burning sensation that occurs continuously or while breastfeeding; Fever from 38.5 degrees Celsius
